name: ODGJ (obviously dodgeable gelatinous jousts)
description:
JIGGLY!?

Welcome to Obviously Dodgeable Gelatinous Jousts or ODGJ a game about shooting blobs of "goo" at your opponents while also propelling yourself away from them, all while trying to dodge the bouncing shots still flying around the screen at an ever increasing speed! sound convoluted? You bet it is, but with a creative 2 button does all control type gather your buddies around on the couch and get ready to beat the snot outta each other!

also includes a broken singleplayer mode in the off chance you dont have friends!

CONTROLS:

FOR KEYBOARD:

W,T,I,Numpad8,U arrow--------------------drop in player

S,G,K,Numpad5,D arrow-------------------drop out player

A&D, F&H, J&L, 4&6, L arrow &R arrow------turn/shoot/accelerate!

FOR GAMEPAD:

"A"--------------------------------drop in player

"B"--------------------------------drop out player

Left/Right Triggers-------------turn/shoot/accelerate!

esc -------quit
